needXPForNextLevel: You need {xp} XP to reach Level {level}!
tickChecklist: Tick the 'My Missions' checklist every day to get XP!
completeDailyMissions:
Complete ALL daily missions to grow your streak!

If you miss a day, it resets to 0!
joinMission: Join Klinik Pergigian Dr. Karthi's mission to fight Sugar Bugs! Use AI to scan your teeth and keep your smile shining.
seeInsideTooth: See inside a tooth with magic!
toothHero: Tooth Hero! Did you know your teeth are like a superhero team inside your mouth?
incisors: Incisors ‚Äì Front teeth that cut food like scissors
canines: Canines ‚Äì The Tigers! Sharp teeth that tear food like a tiger
premolars: Premolars ‚Äì The Crushers! Strong teeth that crush snacks
molars: Molars ‚Äì Big back teeth that grind food into tiny pieces
dentin: Dentin ‚Äì The strong layer under enamel
pulp: Pulp ‚Äì The soft center where nerves live
whyThisMatters: Why this matters: Healthy teeth help you eat, talk, and smile with confidence!
miniChallenge: Mini Challenge: Can you count how many teeth you have today?
aiLink: AI checks these teeth to see if they are healthy or not.
smallCircles: Small Circles: Move your brush like a tiny Ferris wheel
fortyFiveDegreeTilt: The 45-Degree Tilt: Aim at the gum line where germs hide!
tongueTickle: The Tongue Tickle: Brush your tongue for super fresh breath!
tapPlay: Tap Play to start your training!
theCShape: The 'C' Shape: Wrap the floss around the tooth like a hug
upAndDown: Up and Down: Gently slide it under the gum line
freshSpot: Fresh Spot: Use a clean piece of thread for every tooth!
watchCarefully: Watch carefully and try it tonight!
mythVsFactTitle: Myth vs. Fact: Is candy the only villain?
myth: The Myth: If I don't eat candy, I won't get cavities!
fact: The Fact: Sticky foods like crackers, bread, and dried fruit can stay on your teeth longer than chocolate!
bacteriaTurn: Bacteria turn these starches into acid just like sugar.
miniChallengeSnack: Mini Challenge: Can you name one healthy snack that isn't sticky?
ourMissionContent: ToothyMate is your friendly dental companion! We make learning about oral hygiene fun using 3D models and AI magic.
techMagicContent:

madeWithLove: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for Klinik Pergigian Dr. Karthi
howDoIGetAStreak: How do I get a Streak?
streakExplanation: A Streak is when you brush everyday without stopping! Tap the checkboxes on the Home screen daily. If you miss one day, your fire goes out!
levelUpExplanation: You need XP (Experience Points) to level up. Every time you tick a mission, you get +20 XP. Reach 100 XP to grow from a Cadet to a Legend!
trophiesExplanation: Tap on any gray trophy to see the secret mission. Some require brushing early, and some require finishing lessons in Tooth School.
toothSchoolExplanation: Go to the "Learn" tab to watch videos! Test your brain with Quizzes and use the Timer to brush perfectly for 2 minutes.
aiScannerExplanation: Tap the big Orange Button at the bottom! Point the camera at your teeth to detect plaque or cavities using AI.
threeDCameraExplanation: Tap the blue card on the Home screen to see a magical 3D tooth floating in your room!
appSlowExplanation: Try closing other apps on your phone. ToothyMate needs energy to run the AI Scanner!
soundExplanation: Check your phone volume. We want you to hear the "Yahoo!" when you win.
wantToStartOver: Want to start over with a new name?
clearStarsAndBadges: Do you want to clear your stars and badges?
completedEveryMission: You completed every mission. Your smile is officially a Super-Smile!
resetWarning: This will delete your Name, Level, and Trophies forever!
watchVideoFirst: Watch the video first, then tap Play to follow along!
brushTeethMorning: Brush your teeth in the morning!
pointCameraFlat: Point camera at flat surface and tap to place
walkAroundTooth: Walk around the tooth to find numbers!
tapOnDotsToPlace:
TAP ON DOTS
TO PLACE TOOTH!
movePhoneGently: Move phone gently to find dots...
goAroundTooth: Go around the tooth to find numbers!
lookAtNumbers: Look at numbers on teeth, then
welcomeARInstructions: Welcome to Dr. Karthi's Magic Dental AR! Point your camera at a flat surface and tap the dots to place the tooth.
walkAroundInstructions: Walk around the tooth to find numbers, then tap the buttons below to learn!
case1Desc: Like a bridge over a river! We put a fake tooth in the empty space and hold it up using the strong teeth next to it.
case2Desc: A super strong bridge! Instead of holding onto other teeth, it stands on special metal roots hidden in the gums.
case3Desc: A bridge with wings! It has tiny wings that stick to the back of your other teeth to hold the new tooth in place.
case4Desc: A robot root! It's a tiny metal screw that acts like a real tooth root, so we can put a brand new tooth on top.
case5Desc: When gums get shy and pull back! This happens if we brush too hard. We need to be gentle to keep gums happy.
case6Desc: Cleaning the inside of a tooth! If a tooth gets a tummy ache deep inside, the dentist cleans it out to make it feel better.
case7Desc: A tooth with a sugar bug hole! Germs made a tiny hole here. The dentist needs to clean it and patch it up.
case8Desc: A sleeping tooth that's stuck! This big back tooth is trying to come out but got stuck against its neighbor.
case9Desc: The grown-up teeth! These are the very last teeth to grow in the back of your mouth when you are much older.
case10Desc: A hidden hole between teeth! Sugar bugs hid in the tight space between two teeth, so the dentist is fixing it.
